questions:
What is the main subject of the photo?
A) A bird
B) A butterfly
C) A flower
D) A leaf

What situation does the photo depict?
A) A butterfly resting on the ground
B) A butterfly flying
C) A butterfly on a flower
D) A butterfly on a leaf

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A flower
B) A butterfly
C) A leaf
D) A bird

What can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) A clear blue sky
B) A sandy ground with dried leaves and twigs
C) A flowing river
D) A dense forest

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) Tall trees
B) Green plants and stems
C) A rocky path
D) A wooden bench

What colors are prominent on the butterfly's wings?
A) Red and yellow
B) Black and blue with orange spots
C) Green and white
D) Brown and grey

A) Sandy and rocky
B) Wet and muddy
C) Covered in grass
D) Snowy

What type of environment does the photo suggest?
A) Urban
B) Coastal
C) Natural and outdoors
D) Indoor garden

What is the condition of the leaves in the background?
A) Fresh and green
B) Dried and brown
C) Covered in snow
D) Wet and shiny

B) Spotted with orange and blue
C) Solid color
D) Checkered

B) Two

D) Four
